ohe = preprocessing.OneHotEncoderFromDataFrame(categorical_feature_names=[
    'one', 'three'], copy=True)
ohe.fit(self.data)
transformed_data = ohe.transform(self.data)
expected_data = pd.DataFrame({'one': [1, 2, 3, 1], 'two': [2, 2, 2, 5],
    'three': [0, 5, 0, 5]})
pd.util.testing.assert_frame_equal(self.data.sort_index(axis=1),
    expected_data.sort_index(axis=1))
